scene_description_enriched: The image depicts a male figure, likely Christ, wearing a crown of thorns and holding a reed in his left hand and a bundle of cords in his right. He is shown from the waist up, with a halo behind his head. The figure is framed by architectural elements that suggest an interior setting, possibly a niche or a stylized architectural opening with columns and arches. The background is filled with decorative elements and clouds.
